purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation and definition of the composite materials of a product.

inscope.li: definition of the composite material of a product;
definition of the composite material of a shape of a product;
definition of the composite material of an element of a shape of a product;
definition of product properties derived from the composite material composition of a product;
representation of the value of a composite material property as specified or measured in a particular environment;
items within the scope of application module Part and zone laminate tables, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1770.

outscope.li: description of the composition of a composite material contituent.
